particle_offset.description: [gizmo_position] The offset for the particle effect in meters in x/y/z.

particle_rotation.description: [gizmo_rotation] The initial orientation on particles (relative to the root).

duration.description: The time in seconds that the particle effect will run. 0 means that it will only be triggered and not removed.

inherits_rotation.description: Wether or not the particle effect should inherit the world-rotation from the node that it is emitted from.
